name: Red Pepper Risotto
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan. Heat the oil in an ovenproof pan, and then fry the onion for a few minutes until softened. Turn up the heat; tip in the rice, stir, and then fry for 1 minute more.
2. Pour in the wine (or more stock) stirring until absorbed, then tip in the tomatoes peppers, and 400mL of the stock. Cover and bake in the oven for 25 minutes until the rice is tender and creamy.
3. Stir in the remaining stock and parsley, season and scatter Parmesan shavings.
